item.title: BL-80/NV-223 East At 6th St.
item.description: BL-80/NV-223 east (Humboldt Ave.) at 6th St in Wells. Turn right to continue east on BL-80/NV-223 and for I-80/US-93. This is the only NV-223 shield that I have seen in Wells. Most of the route is signed with a BL-80 shield.

item.title: BL-80 - Wells
item.description: BL-80 shield along Humboldt Ave. in Wells

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 351 Offramp at BL-80/NV-223
item.description: I-80 West - Exit 351 Offramp at BL-80/NV-223 (Humboldt Ave.) in Wells. Turn right for BL-80 West/NV-223 to Wells; left for Angel Lake. This is the western end of the Wells business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 352B - East Wells.

item.title: US-93 North at BL-80 and NV-233
item.description: US-93 North at BL-80 and NV-233 (unsigned).

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 352B - East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 352A - East Wells.

item.title: US-93 North at BL-80 and NV-233
item.description: US-93 North at BL-80 and NV-233. Turn left on BL-80/NV-233 for Wells and the Emigrant Trail Center. Continue north on US-93 for Jackpot and Twin Falls (Idaho).

item.title: BL-80/NV-223 East At 6th St.
item.description: BL-80/NV-223 east (Humboldt Ave.) at 6th St in Wells. Turn right to continue east on BL-80/NV-223 and for I-80.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 352B - East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Business Loop
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 352A. This is the eastern end of the Wells business loop. Typically business loops are not posted on the main exit assembly in Nevada, rather they are on signs like this before the interchange.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 352A - East Wells.
